BALI ZOO PARK TOUR

BALI ZOO PARK TOUR IS EXPERIENCE VISITING HOME OF QUALITY BUILD HABITATS AT PRIVATE ZOO OWN BY BALINESE PEOPLE

Bali Zoo Park Tour  is a Bali Activities Tour to enjoy visiting private zoo own by Balinese with 130 staff and works together as a family, the zoo set in 12 acres lush tropical garden and flowers surrounded.  Very up market Bali Zoo Park with 100s quality build habitats including petting area for animals, walk through bird aviaries, Gibbon Islands, and Komodo Dragon cage and latest open range for african lions den. Bali Tour set out to provide an experience for our visitors that like no other. One of Bali Zoo Park aim is to encourage interaction between our guest and the animals. It’s a truly  Hands-on Experience. With a very large yard and lots of animals and activities that will certainly make your child very happy and feel at home for a long time here, if you want to see your child smile and be happy, visiting Bali Zoo Park is the way, by interacting with the animals here it will help you. increase knowledge and insight from children and you too, If you are on vacation in Bali, it would be nice to take the time to visit Bali Zoo Park

Zoological at Bali Zoo Park

The Bali Zoo Park invites the public to get “Zoological” with Wildlife in Paradise. At the Bali Zoo Park, getting Zoological isn’t just about having exotic animals in eco-friendly habitants, nor is it only about allowing guest to be interactive and hands-on, feeding and riding elephants, petting deer, playing with rabbits, and getting up close and personal in holding snakes, baby crocodiles, and bear-cats, nor is it just about seeing birds shows and lions, tigers and bears up close, it’s all of these things and more. From the moment you enter the gate of Bali Zoo Park you can hold and take picture with our tropical birds, feed the animals and much more. Friendly and welcoming environment make a personal tour, our affordable entrance fees means fun day out for the family. We are able to provide catering for tour groups, schools, or private function such as birthday party, or corporate function. We are easily accessed from all local famous tourism destinations, such as the centre of culture, art and craft, beaches or regional shopping centres. Bali Zoo Park is completely accesible for disabled by way off concrate paths and the Bali Zoo Park is covered under public liability

Activities at Bali Zoo Park

Bali Zoo Park offers some very interesting programs where you can get closer to the animals and birds here, which here offers something very interesting, such as Zoo explorer where you can interact with animals here, breakfast with orangutans where you can have breakfast with orang utan and also offer Romantic Dinner for your holiday by offer Night at The Zoo packages. Imagine those times when man lived in the jungles of the world, and each evening, the uncertainty of darkness would fall to both man and animal. Begin by feeding the elephants as they are at their most playful at the end of the day. Then get to hold and take pictures with Borneo bear cats, pythons and a freshwater baby crocodile before touring the zoo, enjoying dinner under the stars and a fire show. This is the perfect fun date night for lovers of all ages, for friends or the whole family - exciting for children of all ages. So what are you waiting for, take your phone and call us immediately and get special prices for group bookings, if you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to answer all your questions about Bali Zoo Park

Bali Zoo Explorer

BaLi Zoo Explorer Tour is a package from the Bali Zoo Park Tour to get to know the animals at Bali Zoo and see animal shows that are very adorable and funny, and also to increase your or your child's knowledge about the animals that are here. A tour that is quite meaningful, in addition to entertaining yourself by seeing the cuteness of the animals here and also being able to learn a lot about the behavior and types of animals in this Bali Zoo Park. At the Bali Zoo, getting Zoological isn’t just about having exotic animals in eco-friendly habitants, nor is it only about allowing guest to be interactive and hands-on, feeding and petting deer, playing with wallaby, and getting up close and personal in holding snakes, baby gibbons, and bear-cats, nor is it just about seeing birds shows and lions, tigers and bears up close, it’s all of these things and more

Breakfast with Orangutan

Bali Breakfast with Orangutan is a package from the Bali Zoo Park Tour experience to enjoy breakfast accompanied by very exotic animals, namely orangutans, where these orangutans are very intelligent and very clever. Here you can enjoy breakfast while seeing these very intelligent animals, with a very good breakfast will make the atmosphere very pleasant. only here at Bali Zoo Park you can feel this experience. Enjoy with your family and children at the Bali Zoo. besides breakfast you can do other activities such as seeing exotic bird shows and amazing animal shows, walking around the park and seeing artificial forests and animals roaming tamely at this Bali Zoo park. Enjoy morning by having breakfast at the Bali zoo accompanied by very cute animals on the playground, while eating breakfast you can see the behavior and cuteness of orangutans when in their playing habitat.

Night at The Zoo

Night at The Zoo is a package from the Bali Zoo Park Tour experience to enjoy dinner at the Bali Zoo with super delicious dishes and accompanied by a dance performance that is very amazing and very entertaining will make dinner very enjoyable, interspersed with traveling around the Bali Zoo to see very cute and rare animals. Enjoy your holiday in Bali by spending the night at the Bali Zoo in the Night at The Zoo program, We from Bali Tour invite you to enjoy this Night at The Zoo program. Enjoy seeing nocturnal animals such as owls which are amazing, and feeding the animals that are here. The Kingdom by Night…As the day cools, the sun sets, and twilight takes over, prepare yourself for a completely unique island adventure tour where you are invited to enjoy, observe and interact with our exotic assortment of animals in their nocturnal habitats.

Bali Zoo Elephant Ride

Bali Zoo Elephant Ride Tour is one of the Bali Zoo Park Tour packages from Bali Zoo offer exciting activity in the island. From a comfortable bench seat perched a top one of our Sumatran elephants you'll be driven by one of our experienced mahouts through a scenic pathway that winds through parts of the zoo then outside the park you can see where our elephants sleep and bathe.Tour continues through the nearby wilderness as you cross the Wos River on elephant back. These remarkable creatures are the largest land animals and are amongst the world's most intelligent species with brains very similar to humans. Besides being highly cognitive animals with exceptional appetites (they consume up to 250 kg of food daily), elephants are also very emotional beings that are able to communicate with each other using infrasonic sound waves
